hero.subtitle: Community of experts developing AI based on knowledge, values and action.
hero.description: We provide knowledge, create standards, influence law and support AI implementations.

mission.part1: We introduce AI responsibly and with people in mind. We create practical tools,
mission.part2: reports and support networks that really help. We support projects with mission and value.
mission.part3: We act together – because together we can do more.

aiChanges.title: AI changes everything-
aiChanges.subtitle: - health, education, work, security.....
aiChanges.question: ...but who decides about all this? Who determines what is "good", "legal", "ethical"? Who has the courage to ask: for whom is this future we are creating?

whyAraai.title: Why does ARAAI exist?
whyAraai.description: Because we don't want AI development to happen "somewhere else" – without us, without values, without reflection. We create a space where scientists, entrepreneurs, decision-makers and enthusiasts join forces to:

goals.knowledge: Share knowledge, building trust and development
goals.influence: Influence the direction of development in the spirit of responsibility
goals.represent: Represent social interest in the conversation about the future

forWho.title: For Who?
forWho.content: We connect scientists, innovators, business leaders and decision-makers to jointly develop artificial intelligence that serves people, strengthens the economy and builds a conscious society.

experts.title: Experts and researchers
experts.content: Your knowledge can change the world - if it gets into the right hands. At ARAAI we combine research with practice so that science has a real impact on people, decisions and technologies. We create an environment for those who want to conduct research with a mission - not just describe the world, but co-create it.
points: If you are ready to turn knowledge into action – we will help you find partners and conditions for implementation.
Your publications don't have to end at conferences. We help translate ideas into implementations – together with companies, institutions and interdisciplinary teams.
We provide a network of contacts, resources and support so you can focus on what's most important — not on building from scratch.
We build a space for knowledge exchange, discussion and cooperation with other researchers who – like you – are looking for responsible and effective ways to use AI.

business.title: Business and start-ups
business.content: AI is not an add-on. It's the new foundation of business operations. Instead of getting lost in trendy hashtags and empty slogans – you can act smartly, quickly and safely. ARAAI is your technological, legal and strategic background.
points: We will help you distinguish real solutions from marketing noise.
You will meet people who have already implemented AI and know how to do it well.
Together we will build strategies and products that are scalable, legal and ethical.
You will gain a network of contacts, knowledge and support that will allow you to develop AI business for real, not "for show".

decisionMakers.title: Decision makers, administration, EU, Media
decisionMakers.content: Artificial intelligence is not the future - it is the present. And right now we need decisions: smart and bold. To make them, you need to have people around you who understand technology and society. At ARAAI:
points: We give you knowledge that no algorithm or report can replace.
We represent the voice of those who create AI - and those affected by it.
We help create law that works not only quickly, but effectively.
We support you so that you are not alone in the most important decisions of this decade.

enthusiasts.title: AI enthusiasts
enthusiasts.content: Curiosity is the best reason to enter the world of AI. Don't have a PhD? Great - you don't need one. Have questions? Even better. At ARAAI:
points: You can ask any question - and you will get an answer.
You learn together with others - not next to them.
You meet people who think like you and will go further with you.
And if you want, you can work on projects that really change something.

articlesList.title: New Member Recruitment
articlesList.content: We are starting recruitment of new members to the association. We invite both experts and enthusiasts of artificial intelligence.

articlesList.title: ARAAI Association Inauguration
articlesList.content: We are pleased to announce the official launch of the Association for Research and Applications of Artificial Intelligence (ARAAI). Our mission is to support AI development in Poland.

about.title: About us
about.subtitle: We are an AI community that jointly drives innovation and supports breakthrough ideas, shaping the future of Polish society, business and science.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We stimulate the AI ecosystem so that Poland becomes a leader in artificial intelligence and sets innovation in Europe. We create key places where AI knowledge and practice connect. Our actions are a catalyst for future generations, building a world where technology and humans coexist in harmony.

goals.title: Association goals:
left: Activity for the development of artificial intelligence
Developing opinions and recommendations for units of regulations concerning the development and application of AI
Preparing projects and support for the development of AI applications
Participation in creating and reviewing AI regulations
Publications, education and information activities on AI
right: Educational, educational and training activities in the field of artificial intelligence
Associating and representing AI communities to national and foreign institutions
Shaping and promoting ethical, trustworthy and human-centered AI
Organizing and coordinating initiatives (e.g. conferences, fairs, exhibitions, congresses)
